sources.title: Ultimate Desire (1993)
sources.description: A Perfumer,Â Grace Lantel, hires ex-cop Lauren Allen to investigate a string of murders that have a common calling card on all female victims; Graces perfume "Desire" is left at the scene. Lauren goes undercover to investigate a suspect who claims to have created the perfume. However, Lauren begins to fall for him...

metadata.Plot: A psychopathic serial killer dumps a bottle of the expensive new perfume 'Desire' on each of his female victims. Grace Lantel fears that her new creation might become discredited. She charges her security officer, ex-cop Lauren, to help the police investigating. One of the main suspects is former employee Gordon Lewis, who claims to be the real inventor of the scent. Lauren approaches him undercover... and falls for him, putting herself into deadly danger.
metadata.Actors: Martin Kemp, Kate Hodge, Robert Miranda
